job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstronguSummary of the PositionustrongppThe Data Scientist is a nonsupervisory position in the Data Strategy and Analytics DSampA team within Strategy Pricing and Analytics department The DSampA team performs centralized business analytics for USP  supporting all levels of the organization including the Executive Team The Data Scientist performs a highly visible complex and vital role in DSampA related to the forecasting modeling and evaluation of USP products and services including support for business development activities such as strategy development new product development market development Pricing and revenue analysis etc Using a broad range of analytical and business knowledge the Data Scientist performs and coordinates complex analyses surrounding business problems and makes recommendations accordingly They communicate analytical results to nontechnical audiences  translating analyses into concise and clear business recommendationsppbrppstronguRoles and ResponsibilitiesustrongpulliPerform analyses in support of strategic initiatives business development revenue analysis and other needs of the organizationliliLead web analytics for USP publishing platforms providing data and insights to develop KPIs and define variables for key indicators and guide operational decisions and drive strategies by partnering with business stakeholdersliliPartnering with IT and an external vendor drive successful deployment of Adobe Analytics for new publications and functionality enhancements to existing platformsliliBuild sophisticated data visualizations dashboards and reports for business stakeholders using a wide array of data sourcesliliUse data to provide customer insights on a recurring basisliliIntegrate USP proprietary data with external data sources to develop analytical models that answer business questionsliliAct as a thought partner with colleagues across USP on resolving unique business problems using analytics supporting program unit heads site heads strategy leaders and moreliliSet and manage internal partner expectations related to specific deliverablesliulpnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDevelop ad hoc reports and analyses as neededpulliPerform other duties as assignedliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongnbspstrongppstronguBasic Qualifications ustrongpulliMBA or other relevant Masters degree preferred such as Data Science Analytics Statistics Information Systems Computer or Health Science related fieldsliliUndergraduate degree required Preferred majors in chemistry biology or other science degree lili02 years of experience with Masters degree liliMinimum of two 2 or more years of experience with Bachelors degreeliulpstrongnbspstrongppstronguPreferred Qualifications formerly Knowledge Skills amp AbilitiesustrongppgtHighly proficient with the following softwarepulliTableau with demonstrated ability to packageliliPythonliliSQLliliOracle or similar relational database management systemsliulpgtDemonstrated ability topulliinterpret business questions into variables and KPIslilidevelop clear data visualizations with minimal supervisionlilimanipulate and combine large databasesliliinterpret data to solve realworld problemslilimultitask and work in a fastpaced environmentliliexplain highly
